|cpu1_cores = |cpu1_type = |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = |cpu2chip1 = Globespan;GS7070;GS7070-174-008D A2; |cpu2_cores = |cpu2_type = |cpu2_type_rev = |cpu2spd = |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = AMD;AM29LV160DB; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 8 |ram1chip = SK hynix;; |ram1_num = |ram2type = |ram2size = 32 KiB |ram2chip = ISSI;IS62LV256-70U; |ram2_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:E0:EB |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 1.1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = ADSL |addchip = ADSL AFE;Globespan;GT3180;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Askey |manuf_model = RTA110 |manuf_rev = -D73 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 10/2002 |reldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B003UOGMSW |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :''Broadxent Broadband Blaster'' - ''Creative Labs'' "3015-000523", "BROADXENT", "BritePort Discovery", "Rev.0.5" :and "© 2001" is silkscreened on the [http://i12.pixs.ru/storage/4/0/3/Briteport8_3682214_29423403.jpg main board]. *The FCC No. on the label is US: H8NDL01BR110D73CD ([http://remont-aud.net/forum/103-77911-1 Label]) :This would seem to indicate the device is a [[Askey]] RTA110-D73 :This device may thus be similar to the [[Askey RTA300W-D73]] *Used [[Globespan]] GS7070 and GT3180 chips for the ADSL modem. {{see also|Broadxent ADSL Gateway 8120|Actiontec R1524SU}} *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/broadxent-8012u-v-dsl-modem-1284 ''Broadxent 8012U'' on '''SpeedGuide'''] *[https://www.ebay.com/itm/Broadxent-Briteport-8120-ADSL-Gateway-Zyxel-Prestige-643-Router-w-4-Port-Switch-/112771999968 ''Broadxent 8120'' on '''eBay'''] ([http://creativemodems.blogspot.ru/search/label/broadxent Creative]) *[https://www.insidegadgets.com/2014/08/26/inside-the-d-link-dsl-200-adsl-usb-modem-dated-2002/ ''D-Link DSL-200'' on '''InsideGadgets'''] 
USB ID: 2162 - Creative Labs.
        041e - Creative Technology, Ltd.
2162:2031 Network Blaster Wireless Adapter
2162:500c DE5771 Modem Blaster
2162:8001 Broadxent BritePort DSL Bridge 8010U

041e:5015 TECOM Bluetooth Device
